abstract: Egyptian officials say two sons of former Pres Hosni Mubarak have estimated $340 million in Swiss bank accounts.
snippet: The two sons of former President Hosni Mubarak have an estimated $340 million in Swiss bank accounts, a senior Egyptian Justice Ministry official said Monday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: The two sons of former President Hosni Mubarak have an estimated $340 million in Swiss bank accounts, a senior Egyptian Justice Ministry official said Monday.

headline.seo: Egyptian Official Cites Swiss Accounts of Mubarak’s Sons
